name: DUST MASK
description:
Project for "Game A Week - University of Europe".

A non heroic war shooter aimed to be as realistic as possible (especialy for a one day project). I tried to work with the expectation of an Action packed Shooter and the cold reality: No Faces, No Heorism, Only Uncertanty.
Controlls:

-Look around : mouse

-Aim : right mousebutton

-Shoot : left mousebutton

-Reload : r 

(Music removed from Menu Screen for copyright reasons).
